revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR703N |revision=v1.0 |upc= |ean= |asin=B005VEJ3GM |price= |est_release_date=03/29/2012 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=mobile router,access point |fcc_id=X4YPOLARIS150 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL032PIF |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40ETP-G5 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=3G capable,portable |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=5C:63:BF,EC:17:2F |oui_eth=5C:63:BF,EC:17:2F }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N 3G Mobile Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.cn/pages/product-detail.asp?d=225 Product page (CN)]
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=142962 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] (source for this data) *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr703n On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :"2050500187" and "Rev:1.1" is silkscreened on the board. :[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=40986 issues with v1.7] *[http://www.right.com.cn/forum/thread-52557-1-1.html Pictures on the '''Right''' forums] :"2050000179" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board.
This device is also sold as the '''FAST FW171-3G''' and :the '''Mercury MW151RM''' (v1.6) has an OUI of EC:17:2F.
The default SSID for the device is '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' :is the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC (upper case letters).
UPCs... *845973051785 (???) *6935364051662
